about.title: ABOUT
about.content: Currently in my 3rd year of a Bachelor’s degree in Web Engineering at ESGI Paris, I am pursuing a career in software development. Passionate about building web and software applications, I have gained solid experience in Next.js, TypeScript, PHP, Python and SQL, which I actively apply through academic and personal projects.

items.position: Fullstack Developer Intern – SVT Communication – Villebon-sur-Yvette
items.description:
• Writing and executing test cases / test plans (functional & regression testing).
• Test automation (Selenium, Robot Framework, CI/CD scripts).
• Reporting and bug tracking (Jira, defect tracking) + participation in Agile reviews and meetings.

items.position: QA Automation Test Intern – Capgemini – Casablanca
items.description:
• Writing and executing test cases / test plans (functional & regression testing).
• Test automation (Selenium, Robot Framework, CI/CD scripts).
• Reporting and bug tracking (Jira, defect tracking) + participation in Agile reviews and meetings.

• Website development (PHP, JavaScript, Bootstrap) and CMS integration (WordPress).
• Creation of digital marketing materials for social media to boost visibility and client acquisition.

items.institution: BACHELOR IN WEB ENGINEERING – ESGI Paris
items.description:
• Programming: PHP8, SASS, jQuery, JavaScript, TypeScript, React.js, Node.js (and MVC architectures).
• Design and management of SQL relational databases.
• Git / Docker.

• Programming: Java, Python, PHP, C, C#, JavaScript.
• Database design and management (SQL, MySQL) / Analysis and modeling (UML / Merise).
Life and Earth Sciences, with honors.
Design and development of web solutions for international clients (landing pages, mini applications).
projects: • Design and development of a web application and landing page with Next.js for BFM Énergies.
• Design and development of landing pages for Mira-Ecologia using WordPress and Elementor.
• Development of an e-commerce website for Les délices de Soie using Next.js, NeonDB and Stripe.

items.description: Web applications developed as part of academic coursework.
projects: • Restaurant website: Full development using Bootstrap, JavaScript, PHP, SQL.
• CRUD web application deployed on a Debian VM, featuring a Go API and real-time features via WebSockets.
